text: The first series of the British school drama series Waterloo Road was shown on BBC One, It was shown from 9 March 2006 to 27 April 2006. It has 8 half-hour episodes. It was created by Ann McManus and Maureen Chadwick. It is the first series to be filmed at the old Hill Top Community Primary School building in Rochdale, England. == The series == The show follows the lives of the teachers and the pupils at Waterloo Road, a failing comprehensive school. The school has a lot of problems such as drink driving, underage driving, bullying, homosexuality, marital problems, exclusion, Huntington's disease, teenage pregnancy, abortion, bereavement, sexual harassment, mental illness and suicide. ==Cast== ===Staff=== * Jason Merrells as Jack Rimmer;
